title: Office Space movie font?
content:
Anyone know what font was used for promoting "Office Space"? It's the red font used on the movie poster. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [793250~Office-Space-Posters.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141121012408/http:/typophile.com/files/793250~Office-Space-Posters.jpg) | 34.95 KB |
author: Lindsey Ungar

comments.content:
Rat Fink Roman by House Industries

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&subpage=lettersetter](http://web.archive.org/web/20141121012408/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&subpage=lettersetter "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&subpage=lettersetter")

My apologies for the link. It appears it won't work properly that way. However, I have included a screen shot of the type tester. Please see below.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141121012408im_/http:/typophile.com/files/work_fink_6196.jpg)
